title: List of governors of Hawaii
summary: The governor of the State of Hawaii is the head of government of Hawaii,[1] and commander-in-chief of the state's military forces.[2] The governor has a duty to enforce state laws;[2] the power to either approve or veto bills passed by the Hawaii Legislature;[3] the power to convene the legislature;[4]  and the power to grant pardons, except in cases of treason and impeachment.[2]
